website_summaries.verdict: Waterproof, sealed, and insulated to keep you warm in -25°F with 200g insulation. Versatile mix of textiles.
pros: Omni-grip rubber sole grips snow and ice
Lightweight midsole to combat fatigue and promote superior comfort through cushioning
cons: Not ideal for those with wide feet, and calves could be a bit too large for petite women

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Columbia!
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing them! First thing I noticed was how well made the boots are. The boot has a very sturdy bottom. When walking on ice they have a very good grip. The shoe also has a very comfortable sole, which Is some times hard to find in a snow boot. I read recent reviews saying you should get a half size up, I agree. I usually wear a 5 but got a 5.5 and they fit perfect (even with thick socks)!
customer_reviews.author: ahoysophie

customer_reviews.title: Tough to get on but otherwise very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really comfortable, have great traction (which was very important to me), are lightweight and so far waterproof. I've only used them 3 times. The only con for me is they're a bit tough to pull on, but once my foot is in, it's very comfortable. I don't want to take them off. I've never said that about a boot before!
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: The slip on boots are so warm and comfortable! I went 1 size up so I could get them on and off really easy! Great tread for icy conditions and this far my feet have stayed cozy and dry in Montana winters!
customer_reviews.author: M. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: SO Hard to slip on
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm no doubt (I live in MN) but for slipons I’ve never struggled much to get some boots on. It maybe takes me close to 10 minutes just to get one of them on- and i know you’re probably thinking “girl must have some cankles” or something along those lines- I assure you-I do not. I cringe at the thought of ever putting them on again. Shoe horn is no help either. Bummer because they are really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty cute. I didn't have any trouble slipping them on. I wish they came in pure black. I don't like the purplish-brownish shale color.
customer_reviews.author: LanguidLady

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots to take to Alaska in the deep winter. They did not keep my feet warm and there were not waterproof. I was highly disappointed, and cold!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Warm, waterproof, fits
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER been able to buy shoes online that actually fit (wide feet) and are comfortable ..these boots are both, in addition to being waterproof and warm. I have hit the jackpot. Thanks to the reviewers, I ordered a half a size larger and that was just right. There is enough room to tuck pants in without feeling crowded or bunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Pantagenes

customer_reviews.title: Love them both
customer_reviews.text: bought a half size up based on the reviews, they were right. The picture of these boots don't do them justice. I bought both the black and grey and prefer the look of the grey - so does my hubby. The picture on my computer gives a flat impression for the grey but they have texture and dimension that the picture washes out. Love them both, like these a little more.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marie Logie

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the boots
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the boots, however, the leg opening is way too big for my calves. I bought another pair with laces and returned it thinking that this pair would be easier to put on and off. Yes it is, compared to the other one that I returned, but it is just way too big I'd rather have the one with laces so I can tighten around my legs. Too bad when I purchased the other pair which I returned and ordered again (Columbia Women's Ice Maiden II), it was only $57 yet right now the same exact pair is $79. Oh well, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Kana

customer_reviews.title: Returned -- WAY too tight, in my regular Columbia size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered regular size and felt at least a size too small. Didn't even try on boot two.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Oddly inflexible
customer_reviews.text: This boot is beautifully made, the quality you would expect from Columbia. I was excited to receive these boots as I knew they were going to be perfect. However, what they are is just “odd.” They are totally rigid, no flex at all. There is no padding or support where an insole should be. Hard to pull on and it was liking having my feet in two wooden buckets. I put them on and sat in a chair for ten minutes, just sitting there my feet were aching and I couldn’t wait to take them off. Not what I expected from such a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: elaineTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Almost right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size up, based on reviews. I don't wear thick socks with my boots, so the size worked fine for me. They are cozy and light-weight, which I love. My problem is with the way the material of the boot moves when I walked around in them for a while. It would bend in and press against the front of my ankle. I hope that makes sense. So, with every step I had something pressing into my ankle. Too bad because they are nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: CListen

customer_reviews.title: The boots are a little bit difficult to get on (not unusual for me ) but once on they are a great fit with good socks
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high instep so I ordered a full siE larger than I normally wear. The boots are a little bit difficult to get on (not unusual for me ) but once on they are a great fit with good socks. I bought them because I was planning a trip to Finland where there is up to 8 inches of snow on the ground with air temp of about 20 F. My feet are toasty and I could not be happier. I love these boots. They far exceed my expectations and I would recommend them for anyone needing a cold weather shoe. LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot and style
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style and look of the boot however, if I'd read the previous reviews I probably wouldn't have ordered them. They are very difficult to get you foot into. There is no pull-on tab to help but I truly think the boot opening is really small so a pull-on tab wouldn't help unless one has really tiny feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on solid winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY comfortable boots...they are shorter than some of my other boots, but that is what I like about them. They are tall enough to keep the snow out and they slip on and off very easily, which is what I was hoping for and are very comfortable to walk in and they are solid and warm! I am usually a size 7 but I did need to size up to a 7 1/2...so I suggest sizing up 1/2 a size or more depending on the thickness of your winter socks. I would buy these boots again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Third One's a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two other boots before these and I guess the "Third One's a Charm!" They're perfect! The first pair (another brand) cut the back of my leg with it's inflexible rubber; the second (also another brand) fit like a glove which meant I could barely get them on/off without a fight....These are just right! Comfy, soft around the edge, fit snug but not tight (I can get them on and off easily) and my feet feel quite supported. They're cute, too! Not hugely bulky around the edge so can fit under as well as over pants. I fit between a 6-1/2 and 7, ordered the 7 and it's exactly the right size for me. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: OregonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!  Warm and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots (slip on) along with same boot in tie up and ended up returning this one only out of need to choose and tie up fit my current need better. but I almost kept both!! These boots are very comfortable with good support, warm and sturdy. I have not tried in rain yet. The slip on boot was probable my favorite because of the convenience and ease of slip on. I normally wear a size 8 1/2 shoe so i ordered size 9 and they fit perfect with room for thick sock if i chose to wear one, but i think my regular sock with be fine since the boot is so warm. Highly recommend this boot
customer_reviews.author: doneal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from freezing cold Norway with plenty of snowstorms. These boots were absolutely fantastic. A warm pair of wool socks, and "toe warmers" (an absolute must in the cold), and I could walk all day without any cold toes or discomfort! They also look great...not so clunky that you feel like you have boats on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - easy on/off
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of putting these boots on and off. I like the look and they fit just right. The only drawbacks are that they are the kind of boot that pulls your socks off if they are not long and snug enough! Also, they are not as "padded" or "warm" as I would have hoped, but comfortable enough and warm enough for moderate cold here in Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Good boots but definitely more city boots than anything for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good boots but definitely more city boots than anything for outdoorsy activity. I actually had them on for hiking in snow/ ice, because my trekking boots got wet that day, and maanged the hike, but i felt them slippery, the sole is thin to protect well, and it does not give enough support for those activities. I imagine it is a good pair of boots for the city, except the sole is still too thin to insulate well, so only if you dont stand outside too long. They were snow proof though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She can pull the boot on easily, and can also wear a thick sock if ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a 93 year old female to wear during winter and wet weather when she walks. Purchased a full size larger than she wears, because she has a high instep and I was afraid she would have problems. Turns out, that was exactly what she needed. She can pull the boot on easily, and can also wear a thick sock if needed. The soles gave excellent gripping ability for muddy weather. We have not had any ice or snow yet in November, so cannot report on this element. She loves these boots. They are very warm and lightweight for a winter boot.
customer_reviews.author: RKP

customer_reviews.title: I was afraid to order another pair of rubber columbia boots like the ones that disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to order any more Columbia brand foot wear. My bugaboo waterproof boots were defective and fell apart. I am really hoping that these are worth the cost. They seem a little plain for the price of 80.00? They are warm and fit well. Now, it is just how long until they fall apart? I was afraid to order another pair of rubber columbia boots like the ones that disintegrated? Do not know what to expect with these for hard chores-look almost too delicate-cant imagine mud on the suede leather?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of other people said, they are hard to get on, right at the ankle point of the boot. I even went up a half size from what I normally wear. Although this is the first pair of Columbia shoes/ boots I've ever had so maybe they run smaller. I normally wear a 7 1/2 in most other shoes. I think if I would of went any bigger they wouldn't have fit right anywhere else. They are comfortable and warm. I was concerned about the color, in the description it says grey and Siberia blue. They are a nice light grey.
customer_reviews.author: Charity K

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy & stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I bought them for a trip to Montana. They are warm, comfy & stylish. I wore them with Jeans & a dress skirt. Can be worn with pants tucked in or untucked. They are cushy inside but don't have much arch support. I tried adding support inserts but then they were too tight. I wore them all day & my feet did not hurt. I was hoping these would be the only pair I would need to buy for my trip. I can't see hiking in these so I bought a pair of hiking boots as well. I am happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I'm one of those people who way over think every purchase. I've wanted warm waterproof boots literally for years so I can say that I really researched my purchase. These are reasonably priced,warm, waterproof and with my slacks tucked into the top they even look cute. I've worn them several times when it was raining and they kept me dry and looked like new after being exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: so happy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Purchased this for my mom and she loves it! 61 years old and her and another person moved to a much colder section of her warehouse about 30 degrees cold. She says these boots are amazing and they keep her feet very warm and dry! They are so comfortablex she works about 8-9 hrs a day and she doesn't have anything to negative to say about these boots. Now her fellow co-workers are going to order these as well! Btw she did order a half size up!
customer_reviews.author: None of your Biz

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip on boots
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slip on boot that was stylish and had enough room for my toes to not feel smooshed. After looking for a year, returning a pair that didn't work out and going without, I bought these. I gave them 4 stars because they are a bit stiff where they bend. However, I have only needed them for a few days and am hoping they will loosen up a bit with wear. They are stylish, comfortable, warm (so far) and easy to get on. I wear a 9.5 and bought the 10 as recommended in the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Boot hunter

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 1/2 size big and they are a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 1/2 size big and they are a touch large but I think if I had bought my exact size they may have slightly tight. I am in between sizes depending on the shoe, so it's always ify for me. If you are a solid size in any shoe I would not go up unless you plan to wear thick wool socks on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots. Coming from N. Las Vegas, NV to western NE, I got to buy warmer clothing. Boots were the first thing on my list. Once on they are so comfortable, I don't even care that they are on. (Since I go barefooted in the house almost all of the time, this is quite a big deal for me.) If you like a snug, supportive fit, the size I normally order fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Zuladawn Hall

customer_reviews.title: Narrow foot slips right in!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a warm winter area but visit my kids in cold areas so these boots are a replacement for 20 year old heavy snow boots. They fit great! They are lightweight and will pack easier than my old ones! I have a long narrow foot that slid right into this boot! If anything it is loose in the calf area. I just hope the material holds up to time and disuse like the old ones did. Got them for a price I couldn't pass up!
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: No bend or give to these at all!
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking but feel like their made of cement. No give or bend to these at all. I gave them away. Hard to get on and off because their pull on boots. But the sizing is way off. I sized up too. Didn’t help. These were so stiff and small.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne P

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight for Me
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get into these boots. I ordered a half size up. I pulled, sat on the floor and pushed. My foot would not go in. No stretch or give. Look like plastic. Oh, well, I learned a lesson — try them on first!
customer_reviews.author: InfoTeach

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a warm boot that I could slip on to take the dogs out. I am normally an 11 Wide in women's. I ordered the 11 Medium, and my feet were pretty crammed, but the 12 were perfect! These boots are warm, durable and easy to just slip on! Exactly what I was looking for! They are also extremely cute on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: These were a great purchase if anyone is looking to buy these - ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase if anyone is looking to buy these - I've been wearing them now for two seasons and they are both warm and waterproof even in the wettest snow, BUT....be aware - see how the boot dips a bit in the back - snow does pop in there - not a great feeling to all of a sudden have a clump of snow in your boot but all in all these are great! HIGHLY recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Fiona's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot! It is a well-made, sturdy, comfortable, and well fitting boot. I wear a size 11 and my feet are on the narrower side and these fit nicely, not too wide. I think for someone with wider feet these might be a little snug. I live in a warm climate and bought these for an upcoming ski trip so I cannot comment to the warmth yet.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia B.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I love the dip of the back above the heel
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I love the dip of the back above the heel, but I imagine since they are slip-ons, this is a necessary product design. LOVE the chic, sleek look! These were toasty warm and kept my feet dry. Hope these last as long as the last Columbia snow boots I bought and completely wore out over 8 years! That was the number one reason I searched specifically from this brand. Shipping was fast and both the packaging and boot quality was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Like it for a very selective person
customer_reviews.text: I am very selective when it comes to shoes. I had slip and fall accident and I cannot afford to happen it again. When it comes to the shoes, boots, footwear, I am very very selective. I like these, warm, decent. I don't like the pattern of the shoes but it doesn't bother me much. As long as it is okay when wearing, protective from slip and fall (ice, snow, slippery condition) I am okay. so, I have to say I am okay with this and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Chen

customer_reviews.title: You gotta have these water proof boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfect and are very good looking. I've been wearing mine with leggings and I get compliments on these boots from a lot of people. They ask where I bought them as they are looking for water proof boots too. For what I got in these boots, they are actually priced lower than the many places I was shopping locally in the norther bay area. I never found any water proof boots that looked good enough to try again and the prices were over $100. These boots are so well made and durable, I'll be wearing mine even if it's not raining as it's cold at night much of the time here in the bay area, California.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, but possibly worn before?
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet tested their functionality but out of the box they are beautiful, true to size, a nice weight and feel very comfy. They did have some strange dirt on the bottom almost like they had been worn outside before which was weird but not anything to make me return them
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Warm and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Boots that look great but do the job of keeping feet warm and dry! Thought they were a little longer in height, but still works!
customer_reviews.author: meleokids

customer_reviews.title: Great In/Outdoor winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boots! Worn comfortably in/out doors with medium layer winter weight socks. Haven't used in super cold yet but ready for when needed (with or without heavier socks!) Nice style. If ordering exact size they may be difficult to put on/take off. I got 1/2 size up... 1 foot a little loose but due to my feet (lol) ... they are easy on/off... I think true size would definitely have been difficult on/off. They are a little shorter height on calf than expected but perfect anyways... don't expect to be walking in snow deeper anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Alice845

customer_reviews.title: Best snow boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They are warm and dry. I did go up a half size and they for well with just enough room for bulky socks. They look very cute with leggings when I am just running around but fully waterproof and warm when I tracking through the snow. I have been wearing them for a couple months now and have no complaints. Work every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Missyf

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 11 in shoes and I bought a 12. I can wear these with normal socks or thick ones and haven't gotten blisters. I live in Minnesota and walk to school every day. These have kept my feet warm and dry during commutes down to -10 so far.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Boot adapted to my foot problem.
customer_reviews.text: I have to walk my dog in the snow and cold and sometimes icy conditions. He's not a dog you can just open the door and let him go pee. So several times a day we gear up and I was looking for a warm boot I could slip on and off while holding the little fella in my arms and leave them at the door while I get him dried off etc. These boots are working well for that. And I have good traction for getting down the steps. Most important they don't crowd my arthritic toes!
customer_reviews.author: Wendover

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not as normal!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off, order size larger, and to large, order 1/2 size smaller tight. Not sure what Columbia had in mind for customer to get correct sizing. Other than that most important item, they look nice, seem warm and water proof, if they fit right
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for boots with no laces or zippers. A difficult task I discovered, until I found these. I can easily pull them on and let the dog in/out in the snow. If I will be doing a lot of walking they are comfy and warm. I found that they moved around on my feet a bit, but that was mitigated with thicker socks-so no problem. I would recommend these boots to anyone looking for ease of putting on, surefooted on snow/ice and having toasty toes.
customer_reviews.author: lph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a warm, waterproof and lightweight boot for winter and finally found it in the Columbia Ice Maiden II. From the moment I tried them on they were comfortable and supportive (I have high arches.) Most of the reviews suggested ordering a half size up and I'm really glad I did. I like these boots so much I bought my mom a pair and they work for her, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeobsessed

customer_reviews.title: Best. Boots. Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying these same boots. One pair for me that's lasted over 5 years with absolutely no wear and tear, including the tread which looks brand new still. I've bought two for my daughter, only because she's still growing. They perform just as stated. I wear them in negative temps and slosh through water and never have an issue. Considering how amazing they were made I might not need to ever buy another pair! Recommend these hands down!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, very comfortable, need to go half size up
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Sturdy tread, narrow shaft, snug fit but not hard to get on or off if your calves are not large. I like that they are shorter, very comfortable with just the bottom of jeans tucked in. Like the mix of minimal fur trim (not like some womens's boots that look like a small animal is stuck to each leg), quilted nylon, suede, rubber toe cap. Definitely go a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy, order 1/2 size up if you are on the edge of a size
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and ordered 1/2 size up since I want to be able to wear thick socks and they fit perfectly. If you have high arches, they are a bit snug when pulling them on; pull up handles would be a great addition, but I love them! They are very cute and comfy and not super clunky like my other snow boots.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Weibel

customer_reviews.title: I do not have large calves so if you do it will not fit
customer_reviews.text: I could not get my feet in this boot it was too tight and I ordered them larger
customer_reviews.author: Nan-nan

customer_reviews.title: Good boots, fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I received the boots couple days ago. I wear 7.5 size and ordered size 8. It fits perfectly with a thin sock. I would imagine it would fit ok with a slightly thicker sock too. The boots look very durable and are comfortable to walk in (have not worn them outside yet, just inside the house). I think overall they are a great value for the money and hopefully will keep my feet warm in snow and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for good shoes

customer_reviews.title: Supportive but comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! I needed a sturdy boot (need a shoehorn to get it on) that would support my bad ankle while doing stuff around the barn. Waterproof so I can venture in my horses muddy paddock. Can wear all day... Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: KMTN

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but too hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots until I tried to put them on. I don’t have a high arch st all but it was hard to get on and I didn’t even have thick socks on. I liked the look and the traction on the sole is great but without a zipper I knew they would be a pain all winter getting them on and off. I’m sending them back even though I usually wear an 8-81/2 and I ordered a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Not True to Size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the size I wear, sz 12. Other than the boots being at least a half-size short in footbed from heel to toe, they were decent. If by some miracle you get a pair to fit lengthwise, you might like them.
customer_reviews.author: For Real

customer_reviews.title: Terriffic boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots performed beautifully in New England during blizzard after blizzard. They kept my feet warm and dry, they were easy to put on and take off, and even when they were worn in muddy conditions, a wet paper towel easily wiped them clean. They look as good at the end of the winter as the day I bought them. They are very good looking and light weight. They also have good traction, and they are built very well and hold their shape. I would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Global Business Management

customer_reviews.title: Glad with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews carefully and heeded the advice of ordering up 1/2 size. I am 8.5 so went to a 9 and it's fine. I did try on Columbia boots at a store and noticed the smaller fit. Sure these will suit my needs for the occasional winter walking and shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Fit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these boots and six and a half hoping they would work I normally wear a size 6 wide... However they were a bit too tight across the instep and I had to return them. They also didn't have quite the Comfort soul I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Boots would be better if they came in sizes W, WW, 2 E
customer_reviews.text: Boots look nice, they seem to be warm, strong, but they were too narrow for my feet. I thought that ordering them a size up would make them roomer for my feet, but I was wrong, it did not. It'd be nice if they came in W, 2E sizes. Had to return them :(
customer_reviews.author: I Know It

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 1/2 size large for my wife for Christmas. Had to return them and get another 1/2 size larger. Too bad they are not true to size. Otherwise she absolutely loves these boots and they appear to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: DAMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Warm, thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7M but occasionally a 7.5M. Based on customer reviews, I also bought the 8M. The 7.5 was just right. These boots are warm as promised on a -3 degree morning. They are very comfortable except for a seam on the front of one boot that irritated my shin. I used a heel pad to cover the bump and am now very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Boots
customer_reviews.text: Columbia Boots.. These are well made, I will give it a 5 on that, but very hard to get off once on. Hubby will be pulling these off each time when we take the dog out this winter.. The size, glad they are large, as I like big socks when outside and these will fit the bill.. They are gorgeous, easy to get in and as I stated need help getting out of them. A tab would have solved this.. I have normal size calves .
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: They are warm and comfy BUT
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black one. Picture shows they are entire black. Ordered it twice and twice they are black with gray fur. Why??? Also, although they are warm and comfy, they are difficult to put on (difficult to grab and hold to slip your foot in it) and even worse to take off (the front isn't too bandy and it's hard to take the foot out).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funny fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit oddly on me. I am a 9.5 -10 and ordered the 10. They fit small with regular socks. They were also wide. If you have a foot on the narrow side, I would order a different pair. Mine are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: LoraDora728

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 8 but ordered big based on the reviews. I couldn’t even get my feet into a size 9. Just ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: john messina

customer_reviews.title: great price, cute product
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears these in Sweden and love them. They are water proof, comfy, and cute. Only down side is it's a little hard to clean b/c it's got a swade texture to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tswj

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but too small
customer_reviews.text: These are well made boots but they ran too narrow for me. I ordered them in the same size as other boots I have but these ran narrow and short. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Vt. Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but lack comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. Great at keeping my feet dry through the slushy snow for about an hour. However they're not the most comfortable on the bottom. I'm going to try memory foam inserts to see if they help. I walked around about four hours (1 in snow) and while they kept me warm, my feet were a pretty sore after, mainly the heel. For the price though adding the inserts might be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these all winter here in Utah and they are warm and cozy. They fit great and have seemed to keep my feet dry. I haven't put them through a rough, wet, winter test yet but the little snow they have experienced they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: MarySoJo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, great footing for clumsy people, and not clunky like other snow boots. I have a pair of north face boots for hiking and just got these to slip on and off to take my dog out but these are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up to have room for socks. Glad I did. Although I still couldn’t wear thick socks with these boots, I haven’t needed to. By far the best snow boots I’ve ever owned! My feet never get cold even with very thin socks. Good grip on the bottom. Extremely comfortable. I can wear them for hours and my feet never hurt. I will be buying another pair for when these wear out. They’re that good!
customer_reviews.author: A Rouch

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pair of boots I like!
customer_reviews.text: I would tend to agree, when in doubt order 1/2 size bigger. I normally wear between a 9 and 9 1/2 and the 9 1/2 is fine. they do look nice to wear and not feel like you are in clunky boots. I have large calves but they fit fine. my only complaint so far is I have to "help" them on a bit..maybe that will change, but I have to get my heel over the "heel cup"..they are warm so far! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Z

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Comfortable and dry!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found my winter boot!!! I ordered a size 9 (normally 8.5). The shaft of the boot is padded and fits snuggly on my calf the foot bed is roomy and also nicely padded. I haven’t used in snow yet but I rain and cocked weather my feet were secure, warm and dry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not good on traction
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, many said to order 1/2 size larger and that proved to be wise advice. I did and they fit nice. BUT I was VERY DISAPPOINTED that they are not very good at providing traction on icy surfaces (which is why I bought them in the first place. Over all they are nice boots, and keep your feet warm and dry. Just do not think you are safe stepping onto ice because you are not! I nearly fell the first day I had them walking out to the mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Souer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so warm and comfortable! Waterproof, easy slip on and off! Midwest winter approved! Like these so much I have gotten my sister a pair and my daughter as well as myself.
customer_reviews.author: Patty t

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I am utterly in love with these boots. They are incredibly warm and oh so comfortable. I generally wear a 6.5 but 7 in boots. I ordered the 7 and they are perfect. They are also very attractive. I have had tons of compliments this winter. I even had to give the brand and type to my dentist! As a sidenote, I did find these at a much cheaper price on the Columbia site, however the size selection was very small as it appeared they were being phased out for the winter. My size was not available.
customer_reviews.author: choise

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot, Runs Small, Not so warm after all...
customer_reviews.text: Wear 6.5, ordered 7...length OK with regular socks (don't need heavy socks with the boot anyway). Boot width and ankle are both narrow. With that said, love the boot...my feet are warm and cozy even in freezing snow and they look very nice with pants... 03/10/2015: Surviving the worst winter EVER, I would NOT recommend these boots for anyone whose feet have a tendency to get cold. Stayed dry enough in snow and ice, but used Hothands Toe Warmers in toe section. Otherwise, the boots would have been uncomfortably cold...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love these Boots!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I ordered one size up. I wear a size 10 and they didn't offer a 101/2 so I ordered an 11. They fit perfect. I live in Montana where we have very cold temperatures. When I got these I put them on with thick socks and went out to clean the snow off of my car. I stepped into the snow by the car and sunk in about 8 inches. My feet stayed dry but they were cool but not cold. It was 20 below after all so I can't complain. I love, love, love these boots. By the way they where very easy to slip into unlike some customers stated.
customer_reviews.author: Knockma

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put on if you have a high instep
customer_reviews.text: The boots look fantastic. Unfortunately, I have a VERY high instep and I had an extremely difficult time getting my foot into the boot. I had to return them because I would not be able to get them on without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: S from C

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely built and great materials
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built and great materials. I would have kept them but they were hard to get on my feet and once they were, they squeezed me at the arches. They're very narrow. If you have slim feet, I recommend trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Abbadeer

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This boot fit, is just right as far as warmth, and is easy to get on and off. It is water resistant and easy to brush clean. The sole is great on concrete and has an ample cushion for hours of wear. Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: V. J. Luna

customer_reviews.title: love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear outside when I fill bird feeders, walk dogs, etc. I am completely satisfied with their fit, warmth, and how clean looking the material stays. We have had several inches of snow this winter. The boots stay dry. They do the job I wanted and also look attractive to wear to go shopping and other errands. I did order a half size larger than my regular shoe size, as the reviews I read said the boots did run small, The fit is perfect so I would follow suit and order a half size larger They are a great product!
customer_reviews.author: hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Wear with thin socks!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these boots. I love them! Yes, hard to get on but that is because they have no lacing. Once on, I have used them every day to walk and hike in the snow. I even used them for 3 hours of snowmobiling and my feet were warm and cozy. I've walked for over 12 miles at a time and no problems. My only complaint is that I wanted a size 9 and wound up with a 91/2 because they wanted $30 more for size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Might work well for someone without a high arch.
customer_reviews.text: I have a high instep and I couldn't get my foot in without difficulty. It didn't help that the back of the boot is lower than the front and there is no tab to help leverage one's foot into the boot. Also the fur around the top is a lighter grey than it appears in the photo. I didn't care for the two color combination. I much preferred the black fur on the other model. There is also very little arch support.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: At first when I tried these boots on they were a little tight. But after the third day of breaking them in they are comfortable and they do keep my feet warm and dry. Very happy with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Koo

customer_reviews.title: I bought them 1/2 size larger as recommended, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought them 1/2 size larger as recommended, perfect fit. Very warm, they are not a sleek boot but they are comfortable to walk in and wear. Very easy to operate a motor vehicle while wearing. I still tuck a pair of shoes in a bag to change into at the office.
customer_reviews.author: mr and mrs

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When the boots first arrived, i thought i was going to have to break them in a few days for them to be comfortable; however, the first time i wore them, they were a perfect fit and i didnt have to break them in. I've worn these boots in negative 10 degree weather with a thin sock and they have kept my feet warm. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY comfy right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: REALLY comfy right out of the box. Some reviewers said they were hard to get on but I had no trouble and I have big calves and ankles. Comfy as an UGG but weatherproof and more support. No annoying buckles, ties or zippers. What more could you ask for? They are cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and found these boots to fit perfectly! It's hard for me to find boots I like but these were comfortable and had good grip on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mehrnia

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super warm and comfortable. I hardly knew I was wearing them. Sole is thick but not clunky. I wore them in powdery snow and they were warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: deanna l wilson

customer_reviews.title: There okay
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it's so hard to get them on, I got a size up and I still struggle to get my foot all the way in. Other than that they are warm and waterproof witch is a plus. And they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Coustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are warm & perfect for the Midwest snow. I usually wear an 8.5 or a 9 i boughts these boots in a 9.5 based on the reviews. I have plenty of room & could wear heavy socks if needed. They are not real bulky & I can still wear them when I drive to work. Great boot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: very narrow and run small
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots but they do run very narrow which I need and are hard to find. I did size up also and they fit beautifully. I normally wear a 7 narrow or 6 1/2 medium and these are 7 1/2 and fit perfectly. They are bit snug to get on and wish they had a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Snow shoes
customer_reviews.text: Too small! I wear a size 11 shoe and they didn’t fit! Must go up a size
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I do love these boots, however like some of the reviews - there is no arch support so I will be putting in my own insoles. I ordered them in an 8.5 which is the size I normally wear and there is plenty of room for heavy thick socks. They are super easy to put on and take off but I have thin calves and feet so that is why I didn't size up and it works for me. I haven't worn them on ice or in the snow yet so I can't comment on that yet. They came super fast and were packaged great. Thank you Columbia and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Just shoveled and blew snow off of 20 driveways and sidewalks. My feet stayed warm and dry. Plus these boots look nice too. I like that they don't have a zipper that could allow water to get into them. I'd 100% recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: ATNT1996

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Very comfortable. Super cute for a winter boot. Not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Angel P

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for Winter
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boots for my mom as she works in a cold area of the company. She says that they fit just right and that she doesn't feel her feet cold when she's wearing them. They are good against water too. I really don't have anything bad to say about them.
customer_reviews.author: Beautylove13

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews I wear an 8 or 81/2 so I went with a 9 So I can wear thick socks they are warm just like my ugg boots
customer_reviews.author: Tangi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warm boots!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in shoes, so in lieu of other reviews, I ordered a 9.5. When I tried them on, even they were super tight. So I exchanged them for a size 10, and these fit fine. Honestly, I think a 10.5 would have been okay too, but since I was impatient, I decided to keep these. After wearing them for a few days, they're exactly what I wanted. They're super warm, even though my socks aren't particularly thick or nice. While I haven't had the chance to try them in a foot of snow yet (thankfully!), they're definitely waterproof enough and warm enough, that I have no doubt they'll keep up through winter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Heslar

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Ice Maiden II Slip Winter Boot
product_meta.description:
The ice maiden may not sound so warm and friendly, but they most definitely are, not to mention good looking, sure-footed, lightweight and waterproof. How To Measure - Fold up at dotted line.Place against a wall or other 90 degree surface. Place heel against fold/wall on flat level surface.Mark the end of the longest toe with a pen or pencil.Measure both feet and use the larger measurement.Read measurement and compare to size chart.When comparing on the size chart, determine the closest larger measurement and use that number to determine your shoe size for your country’s shoe measurement standard

Columbia offers a wide variety of outdoor performance footwear, outerwear, sportswear, and accessories. Columbia products are engineered using the best technologies and highest quality materials, providing you with innovative products that are functional yet stylish and a great value.
feature_bullets: Techlite lightweight midsole for long lasting comfort, superior cushioning, and high energy return.
